医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
UTHealth 休斯顿研究调查大流行期间的驱逐保护如何影响心理健康在新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 大流行期间，暂停驱逐令阻止或推迟了许多人无家可归的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/UTHealth-Houston-study-to-examine-how-eviction-protection-during-the-pandemic-affects-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/UTHealth-Houston-study-to-examine-how-eviction-protection-during-the-pandemic-affects-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d1558d1-450b-4a7c-95d5-7fabcb84b27c Wed, 18 Oct 2023 22:17:09 -0400 UTHealth Houston study to examine how eviction protection during the pandemic affects mental health
COVID-19 感染与患吉兰-巴利综合征的风险增加相关根据 2023 年 10 月 18 日在线期刊《Neurology》（美国医学杂志《Neurology》）上发表的一项研究，感染 COVID-19 会增加在未来六周内患上称为吉兰-巴利综合征的罕见疾病的风险。美国神经病学学会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/COVID-19-infection-linked-with-increased-risk-of-developmenting-Guillain-Barre-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/COVID-19-infection-linked-with-increased-risk-of-developmenting-Guillain-Barre-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0a98c42-c037-417a-a644-555f9cf47ced Wed, 18 Oct 2023 22:10:54 -0400 COVID-19 infection associated with increased risk of developing Guillain-Barré syndrome
机器人假肢脚踝让截肢者能够更“自然”地移动北卡罗来纳州立大学和北卡罗来纳大学教堂山分校的一项新研究表明，由神经冲动控制的机器人假肢脚踝可以让截肢者更加“自然”地移动，从而提高他们的稳定性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Robotic-prosthetic-ankles-allow-amputees-to-move-more-naturally.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Robotic-prosthetic-ankles-allow-amputees-to-move-more-naturally.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4479fe7b-03eb-4c4a-b7f5-1378414efbbf Wed, 18 Oct 2023 22:03:38 -0400 Robotic prosthetic ankles allow amputees to move more "naturally"
丹麦研究显示，移民面临 2 型糖尿病较差护理的风险更大一项针对患有 2 型糖尿病的丹麦居民进行的大型全民研究表明，移民通常比本土丹麦人面临更大的疾病护理风险，特别是在监测疾病和控制生物标志物方面；管理与糖尿病相关的关键物质的血液水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Migrants-face-greater-risk-of-inferior-care-for-type-2-diabetes-Denmark-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Migrants-face-greater-risk-of-inferior-care-for-type-2-diabetes-Denmark-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b27da622-0a9c-49f6-93d2-2dac6282d58b Wed, 18 Oct 2023 21:44:10 -0400 Migrants face greater risk of inferior care for type 2 diabetes, Denmark study shows
研究发现电子烟口味限制可能会增加卷烟销量电子烟在年轻人中的广泛流行导致许多政策制定者限制调味品种的销售。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/E-香烟-flavor-restrictions-may-increase-香烟-sales-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/E-香烟-flavor-restrictions-may-increase-香烟-sales-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3bc25ce9-1065-4972-a26a-92a917933c08 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 21:15:21 -0400 E-cigarette flavor restrictions may increase cigarette sales, study finds

新研究所将基于食物的营养干预措施纳入医疗保健​一家新成立的首创机构旨在通过致力于将基于食物的营养干预措施纳入医疗保健中来治疗疾病并促进健康公平，从而解决医疗系统中的明显差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/New-institute-to-integrate-food-based-nutrition-interventions-into-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/New-institute-to-integrate-food-based-nutrition-interventions-into-health-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9027bd58-fc27-4422-b126-c0ceea7bdab3 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 20:56:04 -0400 New institute to integrate food-based nutrition interventions into health care
远程医疗可以改善阿片类药物使用障碍治疗的获取和保留一项分析肯塔基州和俄亥俄州 2019-2020 年医疗补助数据的新研究显示，与在非远程医疗环境中开始治疗相比，通过远程医疗开始丁丙诺啡治疗阿片类药物使用障碍与延长治疗时间的可能性增加相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Telehealth-initied-buprenorphine-treatment-linked-to-higher-treatment-retention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Telehealth-initied-buprenorphine-treatment-linked-to-higher-treatment-retention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6053b597-6fe2-40b7-aef7-499f459b782c Wed, 18 Oct 2023 20:46:00 -0400 Telehealth may improve access and retention for opioid use disorder treatment
泛冠状病毒疫苗在小鼠研究中取得成功一种旨在预防三种不同致命冠状病毒的疫苗在小鼠研究中取得了成功，证明了杜克人类疫苗研究所研究人员开发的泛冠状病毒疫苗的可行性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Pan-coronavirus-vaccine-shows-success-in-mouse-studies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Pan-coronavirus-vaccine-shows-success-in-mouse-studies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=287d2ede-a92b-49ad-ad5d-cf7e973e1d04 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 20:42:40 -0400 Pan-coronavirus vaccine shows success in mouse studies
